Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நிலத்தில் கிடந்தமை கால்காட்டும் காட்டும்குலத்தில் பிறந்தார்வாய்ச் சொல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Of soil the plants that spring thereout will show the worth: The words they speak declare the men of noble birth.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: In a split composition: on the left, a thriving, healthy plant ('kal') grows from rich, fertile soil ('nilam'). On the right, a noble individual from ancient Tamil society is speaking, their words visualized as elegant, glowing Tamil script.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The roots of the plant on the left visibly draw nourishment from the good soil. The glowing script from the person's mouth on the right is shown to originate from a pure, radiant heart.
Layered_Composition.Background: A serene and prosperous landscape that subtly unifies both halves of the image, suggesting that both natural and human quality spring from a good origin.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual parallel between how the quality of soil is revealed by the plant that grows from it, and how the quality of a person's lineage ('kulam') is revealed by their speech ('vaich sol').
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The healthy plant symbolizes the outcome of good soil. The glowing, graceful Tamil script ('வாய்ச் சொல்') symbolizes noble speech. The split-screen effect emphasizes the direct comparison.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Natural, life-giving sunlight on the plant side. A soft, inner, golden luminescence emanating from the speaker on the other side. A palette of earthy browns, vibrant greens, and noble golds.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Centered wide shot, balanced composition, shot on a 50mm lens.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with detailed textures on the soil, plant, and the person's attire.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Soft, natural lighting on one side, and symbolic, internal radiant light on the other.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Allegorical realism, with a clean, diptych-like visual structure.

Cultural_Anchors: Metaphor of soil and plant ('Nilam' and 'Kaal')
The revealing nature of speech ('Vaaych Sol')

Negative_Prompt: wilted plant, harsh speech bubbles, dark or stormy background, modern elements, blurry, text artifacts, violent imagery.
